page.title: 06A Church without walls.
page.content: {St. Marks Church}in Coulby Newham has lived in community buildings for seven years. This has meant: - learning how to share space and availability of bookings with other groups so having a natural, as opposed to priviliged, place in the community. -people, especially children, recognising the church as a group of people - not a building. - the challenge of doing religious things without many aids or{symbols. - the opportunity to discover new patterns of{worship}and{leadership which naturally come from all being on the same level. - the flexibilty of moving our chairs round for particular purposes or moving to different buildings when the situation demands. In this way we experience the joys and pains of being a pilgrim people.
